activities: Corporate Investigations, Inc. is a national provider of employment-related background screening services that collects personal data for the purpose of providing its clients with the necessary information required to make informed employment screening decisions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: National Association of Professional Background Screeners - NAPBS
recoursemech: Corporate Investigations, Inc. commits to cooperating with data protection authorities (DPAs) located in the EU or their authorized representatives.
